member.name: T:AStar.FilesApi.Client.SDK.FilesApi.FilesApiClient
member.summary: The class.

member.name: M:AStar.FilesApi.Client.SDK.FilesApi.FilesApiClient.#ctor(System.Net.Http.HttpClient,Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.ILogger{AStar.FilesApi.Client.SDK.FilesApi.FilesApiClient})
member.summary: The class.

member.name: M:AStar.FilesApi.Client.SDK.FilesApi.FilesApiClient.GetFilesCountAsync(AStar.FilesApi.Client.SDK.Models.SearchParameters)
member.summary: The GetFilesCountAsync method will get the count of the files that match the search parameters.
member.param: An instance of the class defining the search criteria for the files count.
member.returns: The count of the matching files or -1 if an error occurred.

member.name: M:AStar.FilesApi.Client.SDK.FilesApi.FilesApiClient.GetDuplicateFilesCountAsync(AStar.FilesApi.Client.SDK.Models.SearchParameters)
member.summary: The GetDuplicateFilesCountAsync method will get the count of the duplicate files that match the search parameters.
member.param: An instance of the class defining the search criteria for the duplicate files count.
member.returns: The count of the matching duplicate files or -1 if an error occurred.

member.name: M:AStar.FilesApi.Client.SDK.FilesApi.FilesApiClient.GetFilesAsync(AStar.FilesApi.Client.SDK.Models.SearchParameters)
member.summary: The GetFilesAsync method will, as its name suggests, get the files that match the search parameters.
member.param: An instance of the class defining the search criteria for the files search.
member.returns: An enumerable list of instances.

member.name: M:AStar.FilesApi.Client.SDK.FilesApi.FilesApiClient.GetDuplicateFilesAsync(AStar.FilesApi.Client.SDK.Models.SearchParameters)
member.summary: The GetDuplicateFilesAsync method will, as its name suggests, get the duplicate files that match the search parameters.
member.param: An instance of the class defining the search criteria for the duplicate files search.
member.returns: An enumerable list of instances.

member.name: M:AStar.FilesApi.Client.SDK.FilesApi.FilesApiClient.GetFileAccessDetail(System.Guid)
member.summary: The GetFileAccessDetail method will, as its name suggests, get the file access details for the specified file.
member.param: The Id of the file to retrieve the File Access Details from the database.
member.returns: An instance of for the specified File Id.

member.name: M:AStar.FilesApi.Client.SDK.FilesApi.FilesApiClient.GetFileDetail(System.Guid)
member.summary: The GetFileDetail method will, as its name suggests, get the file details of the specified file.
member.param: The Id of the file detail to retrieve from the database.
member.returns: An awaitable task containing an instance of containing the, you guessed it, File details...

member.name: M:AStar.FilesApi.Client.SDK.FilesApi.FilesApiClient.MarkForSoftDeletionAsync(System.Guid)
member.summary: The MarkForSoftDeletionAsync method will, as its name suggests, mark the specified file as soft deleted.
member.param: The Id of the file to mark as soft deleted.
member.returns: An awaitable task containing a string with the status of the update.

member.name: M:AStar.FilesApi.Client.SDK.FilesApi.FilesApiClient.UndoMarkForSoftDeletionAsync(System.Guid)
member.summary: The UndoMarkForSoftDeletionAsync method will, as its name suggests, unmark the specified file as soft deleted.
member.param: The Id of the file to unmark as soft deleted.
member.returns: An awaitable task containing a string with the status of the update.

member.name: M:AStar.FilesApi.Client.SDK.FilesApi.FilesApiClient.MarkForHardDeletionAsync(System.Guid)
member.summary: The MarkForHardDeletionAsync method will, as its name suggests, mark the specified file as hard deleted.
member.param: The Id of the file to mark as hard deleted.
member.returns: An awaitable task containing a string with the status of the update.

member.name: M:AStar.FilesApi.Client.SDK.FilesApi.FilesApiClient.UndoMarkForHardDeletionAsync(System.Guid)
member.summary: The UndoMarkForHardDeletionAsync method will, as its name suggests, unmark the specified file as hard deleted.
member.param: The Id of the file to unmark as hard deleted.
member.returns: An awaitable task containing a string with the status of the update.

member.name: M:AStar.FilesApi.Client.SDK.FilesApi.FilesApiClient.MarkForMovingAsync(System.Guid)
member.summary: The MarkForMovingAsync method will, as its name suggests, mark the specified file as requiring moving.
member.param: The Id of the file to mark as move required.
member.returns: An awaitable task containing a string with the status of the update.

member.name: M:AStar.FilesApi.Client.SDK.FilesApi.FilesApiClient.UndoMarkForMovingAsync(System.Guid)
member.summary: The UndoMarkForMovingAsync method will, as its name suggests, unmark the specified file as requiring moving.
member.param: The Id of the file to unmark as move required.
member.returns: An awaitable task containing a string with the status of the update.

member.name: M:AStar.FilesApi.Client.SDK.FilesApi.FilesApiClient.UpdateFileAsync(AStar.FilesApi.Client.SDK.Models.DirectoryChangeRequest)
member.summary: The UpdateFileAsync method will, as the name suggests, update the file - currently, the directory is the only thing to change.
member.param: An instance of the class used to control the file update.
member.returns: An awaitable task.

member.name: T:AStar.FilesApi.Client.SDK.Models.SearchParameters
member.summary: The class.

member.name: P:AStar.FilesApi.Client.SDK.Models.SearchParameters.SearchFolder
member.summary: Gets or sets the Search Folder to be used as the root for the search.

member.name: P:AStar.FilesApi.Client.SDK.Models.SearchParameters.SearchType
member.summary: Gets or sets the Search Type for the search.

member.name: P:AStar.FilesApi.Client.SDK.Models.SearchParameters.Recursive
member.summary: Gets or sets whether the search is to be recursive or not.

member.name: P:AStar.FilesApi.Client.SDK.Models.SearchParameters.CurrentPage
member.summary: Gets or sets the Current page for the search. This is not validated against the collection it will be applied to.

member.name: P:AStar.FilesApi.Client.SDK.Models.SearchParameters.ItemsPerPage
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum items per page for the search. This parameter cannot be set > 50. The default is 10.

member.name: P:AStar.FilesApi.Client.SDK.Models.SearchParameters.MaximumSizeOfThumbnail
member.summary: Gets or sets the Search Type for the search.

member.name: P:AStar.FilesApi.Client.SDK.Models.SearchParameters.MaximumSizeOfImage
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum size of the image to be returned by the search.

member.name: P:AStar.FilesApi.Client.SDK.Models.SearchParameters.SortOrder
member.summary: Gets or sets the Search Order for the search. The default is by Size Descending.

member.name: P:AStar.FilesApi.Client.SDK.Models.SearchParameters.SearchText
member.summary: Gets or sets the Search Text for the search. If no search text is supplied, the results will not be filtered based on any containing text. Yep, shocking...

member.name: P:AStar.FilesApi.Client.SDK.Models.SearchParameters.ExcludedViewSettings
member.summary: Gets or sets the excluded viewed items period (in days) for the search.

member.name: M:AStar.FilesApi.Client.SDK.Models.SearchParameters.ToQueryString
member.summary: This method builds a string ready to be passed as the query string for calls to the Files API itself.
member.returns: A string ready to be passed as the query string.

member.summary: Returns this object in JSON format.
member.returns: This object serialized as a JSON object.
